caption: Glenn was one of the legendary singer-songwriters of our time who also formed one the biggest bands of all time. As a kid, The Eagles were always playing in our home #ripglennfrey Thank you for providing the soundtrack to all of our lives. You will be missed #glennfrey #theeagles #eagles #band #music #singer #songwriter #rock #hotelcalifornia #takeiteasy #witchywoman #lyineyes #takeittothelimit #guitar #rocknroll #childhood #desperado #musician #miamivice #actor #classic #classicrock #legend #memories #soundtrack #vocals #ripglenn #gonetoosoon #rip
